TopicTitle: Dark Legacy Comics (Warcraft) does ANOTHER panel about KSP

Articles.Content:
Last reference in Dark Legacy Comics to KSP was back in September.

Looks like somebody has been playing lately.

http://www.darklegacycomics.com/407.html

(Dark Legacy Comics is a World of Warcraft webcomic by Arad Kedar that has been online since 2006.)
Lol! The EVA --> forever orbit --> eventual rescue has definitely happened to me in my early KSP days
